com.ziluck.factions.api.commands

Class CommandArgumentBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ziluck.factions.api.commands.CommandArgumentBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of argument being built.

    public class CommandArgumentBuilder<T>
extends Object
    Used to build new CommandArguments with the necessary attributes.
    Author:
    Michael Ziluck

      • setOptional

        public CommandArgumentBuilder<T> setOptional()
        Marks this argument as optional. It defaults to false which is why there is no option to disable it as each option should only be set once.
        Returns:
        the same builder.

      • setVariableLength

        public CommandArgumentBuilder<T> setVariableLength()
        Marks this argument as having variable length. It defaults to false which is why there is no option to disable it as each option should only be set to once.
        Returns:
        the same builder.

      • setAllowsConsole

        public CommandArgumentBuilder<T> setAllowsConsole()
        Marks this argument as usable by the console. It defaults to false which is why there is no option to disable it as each option should only be set once.
        Returns:
        the same builder

      • build

        public CommandArgument<T> build()
        Returns the CommandArgument that has been built. Will throw an IllegalStateException if the parser has not been set as it is required.
        Returns:
        the built CommandArgument.

        Returns:
        the empty CommandArgumentBuilder.
